mapper.select:
SELECT NU.id, NU.readDate, NU.userId, NU.userType, NU.noticeId, NU.unread FROM MSG_NOTICE_2_USER NU WHERE
AND NU.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSG_NOTICE_2_USER ( id, readDate, userId, userType, noticeId, unread ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{readDate}, #{userId}, #{userType}, #{noticeId}, #{unread} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM MSG_NOTICE_2_USER WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE MSG_NOTICE_2_USER
readDate = #{readDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
userId = #{userId,javaType=java.lang.String},
userType = #{userType,javaType=com.tx.local.message.model.MessageUserTypeEnum},
noticeId = #{noticeId,javaType=java.lang.String},
unread = #{unread,javaType=boolean},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
